page.title: 13LIFE IN LEASOWE (PAGE 3)
page.content:
{Are there any more changes you would {like to see? The pub is probably the biggest eyesore on the estate,and needs a lot of improvement.
{Many more questions were asked.In {general the following could be said: { The Leasowe Estate would appear to be showing a slow,but steady improvement. This is being helped by the council's policy of selling property rather than purely renting. People are friendly, and good neighbours. There are some awkward people,but there are those anywhere. Although the last few years have seen the Estate maturing,there are still many improvements that need to be made. {(T.Inchboard/P.Lloyd)
